entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:18 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 07:18 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023
